bearerAuth.description: API key authentication using Bearer token

get.summary: List MTG SKUs with advanced filtering
get.description:
Query MTG SKU data with PostgREST-style filtering.

## Available Fields

### Core Fields
- `id` (integer) - SKU identifier
- `product_id` (integer) - TCGPlayer product ID
- `condition` (text) - Card condition (NEAR MINT)
- `condition_short` (text) - Short condition code (NM)
- `finish` (text) - Card finish type (NORMAL, FOIL, ETCHED)
- `is_foil` (boolean) - True if finish is FOIL
- `language` (text) - Card language

### Pricing Fields
- `market_price` (numeric) - Current market price
- `low_price` (numeric) - Lowest available price
- `direct_low_price` (numeric) - Direct low price from TCGPlayer
- `lowest_listing_price` (numeric) - Lowest current listing
- `lowest_shipping` (numeric) - Lowest shipping cost
- `has_pricing` (boolean) - True if pricing data available
- `last_updated_at` (timestamp) - Last price update timestamp

### External Platform IDs
- `uuid` (text) - MTGJSON UUID
- `scryfall_id` (text) - Scryfall card ID
- `scryfall_oracle_id` (text) - Scryfall oracle ID
- `scryfall_card_back_id` (text) - Scryfall card back ID
- `scryfall_illustration_id` (text) - Scryfall illustration ID
- `card_kingdom_id` (bigint) - Card Kingdom product ID
- `card_kingdom_foil_id` (bigint) - Card Kingdom foil ID
- `card_kingdom_etched_id` (bigint) - Card Kingdom etched ID
- `mtgo_id` (text) - Magic Online card ID
- `mtgo_foil_id` (text) - Magic Online foil ID
- `mtg_arena_id` (text) - MTG Arena card ID
- `multiverse_id` (text) - Wizards Multiverse ID
- `tcgplayer_etched_product_id` (text) - TCGPlayer etched product ID
- `cardsphere_id` (text) - Cardsphere product ID
- `cardsphere_foil_id` (text) - Cardsphere foil ID
- `cardtrader_id` (text) - CardTrader product ID
- `mcm_id` (text) - Magic Card Market ID
- `mcm_meta_id` (text) - Magic Card Market meta ID
- `scg_id` (text) - Star City Games ID
- `abu_id` (text) - ABU Games ID
- `csi_id` (text) - CoolStuffInc ID
- `miniaturemarket_id` (text) - Miniature Market ID
- `tnt_id` (text) - Toad and Troll
- `mp_product_id` (text) - Manapool Product ID

### Version IDs
- `mtgjson_foil_version_id` (text) - MTGJSON foil version
- `mtgjson_non_foil_version_id` (text) - MTGJSON non-foil version
- `mtgjson_v4_id` (text) - MTGJSON v4 identifier

### Metadata
- `original_release_date` (date) - Original card release date

## Query Examples

**Field Selection:**
```
?select=id,product_id,market_price,condition,finish
?select=*
?select=count
```

**Filtering:**
```
?product_id=eq.12345
?market_price=gte.50&market_price=lte.200
?condition=in.(NEAR MINT)
?condition_short=in.(NM)
?is_foil=eq.true
?has_pricing=eq.true
?finish=eq.FOIL
?language=eq.English
?scryfall_id=is.null
?mp_product_id=eq.MP12345
?mp_product_id=is.not.null
```

**Operators:**
- `eq` - Equals
- `neq` - Not equals
- `gt` - Greater than
- `gte` - Greater than or equal
- `lt` - Less than
- `lte` - Less than or equal
- `in` - In list (comma-separated)
- `like` - Pattern match (* wildcard)
- `ilike` - Case-insensitive pattern match
- `is.null` - Is null
- `not.is.null` - Is not null

**Sorting:**
```
?order=market_price.desc
?order=market_price.desc,product_id.asc
?order=last_updated_at.desc
```

**Pagination:**
```
?limit=100
?offset=200
?limit=50&offset=100
```
(max limit: 1000)

**Complex Query Example:**
```
/api/skus?select=id,product_id,market_price,condition_short,finish,scryfall_id&market_price=gte.100&condition_short=in.(NM,LP)&has_pricing=eq.true&order=market_price.desc&limit=50
```

get.summary: Get a single MTG SKU by ID
get.description: Retrieve detailed information for a specific SKU. Optionally select specific fields using the `select` query parameter.
